message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
You're being too generous, let's split it more fairly!
You wanted a more even split, but I'm not going that far. Still a good deal!
You're not being generous, I'm going to have to take more!
You're getting greedy, Bob! This is a fair offer, don't be stubborn!
I'm not getting greedy, I'm getting smart. You're not offering enough!
You think you're smart, but I'm not backing down! Take it or leave it!
I'm not backing down, and I'm taking more this time!
Time to meet in the middle! No more games, let's split it fairly!
